## `SetRaygorStyle`

Sets the visual style for Raygor graphs for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetRaygorStyle(RaygorStyle style)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`RaygorStyle`](#raygorstyle) style | The visual style to apply. |
